name: Procedural Generation with Gdevelop attempts 2 and 3
name_original: Procedural Generation with Gdevelop attempts 2 and 3
description:
This is 2 methods to make worlds.

Method 1...squares created, sized, resized, spawn things, draw lines

I wasn't happy with method 1 and couldn't seem to get it to work the way I liked...so I might come back to it...probably not though

Method 2...much more simplified ...level generator, where each level is randomly selected

I posted a video showing the prototype.  I think method 2 could be utilized by many Gdevelop programmers...in many ways...many many ways...so I'm not charging for it
